II. Need for funds to establish an NAEB Washington office
A. Purposes
1. As outlined in last year’s request, realization of this project
would provide the close liaison the NAEB needs as it increases its
contacts, and stature, with
a. the other educational organizations of the U. S., most of
which are located in Washington: the NEA (National Education
Association), ACE (American Council on Education), DAVI (Depart¬
ment of Audio-Visual Instruction), the U. S. Office of Education,
the Association of Land Grant Colleges, the MENC (Music Educators
National Conference), and others.
